name: Xenomarine
description: Experience hardcore, sci-fi dungeon crawling in this dark, atmospheric roguelike. Xenomarine offers tactical turn-based combat with hundreds of unique items and upgradable weapons and armor, as well as massive replayability thanks to its randomly generated content.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics supporting DX9 or DX11 with 9.3 capabilities Storage: 200 MB available space
